entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Simcoe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 10:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: NNE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
